characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin. A channeling prodigy with intense spiritual power. Also the youngest.

characters.name: Will Powers
characters.description1: Was the Steel Samurai. His face is a bit intimidating, so he's got hard luck in showbiz.

characters.name: Security Lady
characters.description1: Member of hotel security. I'm pretty sure her real name is Wendy Oldbag.

characters.name: Lotta Hart
characters.description1: Claims to be an investigative photographer. Latest field: the seedy world of tabloids.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Juan Corrida
characters.description1: The victim. A young star who played the Jammin' Ninja. Was on bad terms with Engarde.

characters.name: Matt Engarde
characters.description1: Popular young actor who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.
characters.description2: My client. A hot-shot star who plays the Nickel Samurai. Is rivals with the Jammin' Ninja.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Engarde's manager. An intelligent woman who seems to have it all together.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: A prosecutor in Germany since age 13, she has come to America to defeat me in court.

characters.name: Celeste Inpax
characters.description1: Was Andrews' mentor and Corrida's manager. Killed herself two years ago.
characters.description2: Killed herself two years ago. Was Corrida's manager and fiancée, and Andrews' mentor.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: A gifted prosecutor. He disappeared suddenly a year ago.

characters.name: John Doe
characters.description1: The butler of Engarde Mansion. But for some reason, I get the feeling we've met before...

characters.name: Shelly de Killer
characters.description1: A professional assassin. Always leaves a Shelly card near his victim's body.

evidences.name: Attorney's Badge
evidences.description1: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.

evidences.name: Maya's Magatama
evidences.description1: Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.

evidences.name: The Nickel Samurai
evidences.description1: A glossy photo Maya pushed onto me. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Press Conference Ticket
evidences.description1: Seems like the Nickel Samurai is to confess something after the post-ceremony stage show.

evidences.name: Radio Transceiver
evidences.description1: Originally from the Bellboy. It can transmit and receive signals over great distances.
evidences.description2: Originally from Maya's kidnapper, who goes by the name of "De Killer".

evidences.name: Lotta's Camera
evidences.description1: A very expensive item valued at $1,600. It was stolen around the time of the murder.
evidences.description2: Stolen on the night of the murder. Tabloid article about the victim was in the case.

evidences.name: Hotel Guidemap
evidences.description1: Map of the Gatewater Hotel around the crime scene. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Guitar Case
evidences.description1: Found next to the victim. Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid.
evidences.description2: Empty. There is some water, but only on top of the lid. Bears Corrida's fingerprints.

evidences.name: Wine Glass
evidences.description1: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. No sign it's been drank.
evidences.description2: Found next to the victim. It's filled with tomato juice. Bears Andrews' fingerprints.

evidences.name: Crime Photo
evidences.description1: Photo of Juan Corrida's murder scene. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Autograph
evidences.description1: Juan Corrida's autograph. "To my dearest Wendy" is written on it.

evidences.name: Magazine Clipping
evidences.description1: An "article" from the tabloid "Gossip Land". Click here for details.

evidences.name: Suicide Report
evidences.description1: Deceased: Celeste InpaxFound by: Juan CorridaWas her suicide note hidden?

evidences.name: Attempted Suicide Report
evidences.description1: Attempter: Adrian AndrewsReason: Shock from Celeste Inpax's suicide.

evidences.name: Juan's Autopsy Report
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Time of death: 8:15 PMCause: Strangled with a scarf, then stabbed with a knife.

evidences.name: Knife
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Detective Gumshoe.
evidences.description1: Bears the victim's blood and Engarde's fingerprints. In the grip, "Gatewater" is engraved.

evidences.name: Jammin' Ninja's Button
evidences.description1: Was ripped from his costume. Is covered in Corrida's blood. Found in Engarde's "hakama".

evidences.name: Lotta's Photo
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Miles Edgeworth.
evidences.description1: Picture taken in the Hallway right after the murder. Click here for details.

evidences.name: Picture Card
evidences.description1: Was placed next to the victim at the time of the murder. Ms. Andrews was carrying it.

evidences.name: Letter of Introduction
evidences.description1: Received from Edgeworth. Allows bearer to freely investigate the crime scene.

evidences.name: Matt's Note
evidences.description1: "Please feed my cat, Shoe. My house is just a little ways down from the hotel."

evidences.name: Spy Camera
evidences.description1: Set to record the victim's room from 8 PM for 1 hour. Was running at time of murder.

evidences.name: Transmitter
evidences.description1: Changes the footage taken by the spy camera into radio waves and transmits the data.

evidences.name: Stuffed Bear
evidences.description1: The spy camera was set in its right eye. Found in the victim's room.

evidences.name: Credit Card Receipt
evidences.description1: A receipt for $3,800. Proof Engarde bought a stuffed bear identical to one in evidence.

evidences.name: Figurine
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from Engarde Mansion - Living Room.
evidences.description1: A wooden bear-shaped figurine. It's covered in many thin cuts.
evidences.description2: A wooden puzzle with a hollow inside. Only Corrida and Andrews know how to open it.

evidences.name: Celeste's Photo
evidences.obtained: Retrieved from Engarde Mansion - Wine Cellar.
evidences.description1: Found at Engarde Mansion. "With Love... Celeste" is written on it.

evidences.name: Celeste's Suicide Note
evidences.description1: Found inside the Figurine. It tells of Engarde's horrible misdeeds.

evidences.name: Pistol
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> A small caliber pistol that is thought to have been fired by De Killer at Franziska.

evidences.name: Video Tape
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.  <if asked for details> One of the items retrieved. De Killer violently tried to recover it. Contents unknown.

evidences.name: Bellboy's Uniform
evidences.obtained: Submitted as evidence by Franziska von Karma.
evidences.description1: <if not asked for details> One of the items retrieved from De Killer's hideout. Nothing else is known.<if asked for details> Worn by De Killer on the night of the murder. One of its special buttons is missing.

evidences.name: Whip
evidences.description1: Thrown away by Franziska von Karma, it has a certain mysterious nostalgia to it.
